pages.text: The $(mob)Evoker$() is a monster found in $(thing)Woodland Mansions$(). It attacks nearby players and $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villagers$() by summoning $(l:minecraft_vex)$(mob)Vexes$() and claws on the ground. Claws close up after a short delay dealing damage to anything standing on them.
$(mob)Evokers$() drop a $(item)Totem of Undying$() on death. If a player dies while holding one in their off-hand, it is destroyed to save the player from death.
